faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions quickly

questions.q: How do I apply for the service?
questions.a: You can apply online through the consultation request menu at the top, or call our representative number (010-1234-5678) for prompt assistance.

questions.q: How much government subsidy can I receive?
questions.a: If you have a long-term care grade, over 85% of the total cost is covered. Basic livelihood recipients may have their co-payment reduced or waived.

questions.q: Can I apply for home care, nursing, and bathing services together?
questions.a: Yes, you can apply for all integrated services with a single consultation. Customized services are provided based on the elder's condition.

questions.q: Can I use the service without a long-term care grade?
questions.a: If you don't have a grade, we provide free guidance on the grading application process, and private services are also available if needed.

questions.q: What is the service application process?
questions.a: The process is: Consultation → Home visit/condition check → Service plan establishment → Contract and service start.

questions.q: What documents or preparations are required?
questions.a: You may need a long-term care certificate, ID, and health insurance card. We will provide detailed guidance based on your situation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact us anytime. Our professional consultants will kindly assist you.
